std::ostream& BALL::operator<< ( std::ostream &  s,
const TSimpleBox3< T > &  box 
) [inline]

Output Operator. Writes the two coordinates of the box to an output stream. The vectors are enclosed by brackets.

Example
((0 1 2) (7.5 3.4 10))
